title: World Cup 2023: Even without a ball being bowled, hotels in Ahmedabad are scoring
description: With the ICC Men's World Cup still three and a half months away, hotels in Ahmedabad are already seeing a surge in bookings. Prices for rooms in five-star hotels have skyrocketed, with some going for Rs 50,000 per night compared to their usual rates of Rs 6,500-10,500. The tournament, which runs for 46 days, begins on October 5 and ends on November 19. The highly anticipated matches between India and Pakistan has already attracted a lot of attention and bookings.
